stages.text: You have arrived in a mysterious place, surrounded by nothing but an abandoned old shack infront of you.
Enter 'go north' to approach the shack.
Seems like so long ago we arrived here.
In front of you lays a disbanded old white shack. It looms over you.
Laying in front of the shack is a rusted old sword, belonging to someone long, long ago.
Enter 'pickup' to pick up the item.
Enter 'go north' to enter the shack.
You return to the shack, there's not much to see here.
As you enter the shack, the floorboards begin to rumble and an undead creature bursts out from under the floor.
Ironically, as the undead creature dies, he leaves behind a potion, pickup?
As you gather your surroundings, you realise the room has 4 staircases down below one in each wall of the room.
You return to the 4 way staircase.
The left staircase leads tou below to a tomb occupied by the undead creature you just defeated. You see a new weapon laying on the floor. You continue to pick it up.
You gather your surroundings, but it's a dead end.
You return to the mummy's tomb but there's nowhere to go.

The right staircase leads tou below to a dirty science lab with equipment, paperwork and vials of various liquids scattered all over the floor. You see a potion-like object laying on the floor. You continue to pick it up.
You look at the wall, it's a dead end.
You re-enter the science lab, but it's a dead end.
